title: @Meddle: Patch notes and tooltip for Doran's Shield don't match
body:
The patch notes say it deals 5 damage OnHit.

The tooltip says it deals 5 damage OnHit to *minions only*.

Was that an oversight in the patch notes or an old tooltip that didn't get corrected?

replies.body: Minions only, patch notes are incorrect.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=VEJRalim,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-03T16:48:42.566+0000)
>
> Minions only, patch notes are incorrect.

Good to know.  Should probably see about editing the notes since topics are popping up with people thinking the OnHit damage works against everything.

It's intended to be minions only.
There's a few wording problems in the Patch notes this patch.
